programme.title: The Glory of Global Chinese
programme.sub-title: The Global Journey of Kung Fu
programme.desc: Delve into the dynamic world of martial arts and its remarkable journey from traditional Chinese roots to a global cinematic phenomenon. Through exclusive interviews with acclaimed filmmakers Andy Cheng and Mark Dacascos, we explore the profound influence of Chinese martial arts on international cinema. At the heart of our narrative is the legendary Bruce Lee, whose iconic legacy serves as a cornerstone for understanding the evolution and enduring impact of martial arts in Hollywood and beyond.

programme.title: Three-Body
programme.desc: Wang Miao plays a game with his daughter which inspires him to re-enter the Three-Body game with a new understanding of how to unlock the next level. Mu Xing once again boldly contacts Shen Yufei and decides it's time for her to make a choice.

programme.title: Three-Body
programme.desc: A gravitational pull of the three suns destroys Civilization 184 in the Three-Body game. Pan Han tries to win over Mu Xing with more information, but after recent events, she decides to trust Shi Qiang and steals evidence from Pan Han's computer.

programme.title: My Guardian Angels
programme.desc: Si Jin reunites with Kai Wei who explains that when she was pregnant, Jin Quan objected to them so Kai Wei started a business overseas to earn more money to give her a better life. However, not knowing that he was used to transport drugs, Kai Wei sustained a leg injury and landed himself in jail. Upon returning, he did not dare to find Si Jin.

programme.title: Tharlo
programme.desc: Tharlo lives a simple life as a shepherd, but after an encounter with a hairdresser at the barbershop, he embarks on a journey of love, filled with many surprises and mostly disappointments.

programme.title: Explore China Shorts
programme.desc: Can Hal survive another spicy hotpot challenge?

programme.title: Shock Wave
programme.desc: A terrorist who specializes in explosives takes hold of an underground tunnel and threatens to kill hostages if his demands are not met

programme.title: The Glory of Global Chinese
programme.desc: Visionary designer Sue Wong and Tulane University professor Shieh Hsieh share their experiences blending Chinese heritage with American innovation. Their captivating stories transcend cultural boundaries, harmoniously weaving tradition and modernity into inspiring narratives of creativity and transformative collaboration.

programme.title: The Rebel Princess
programme.desc: Zi Lu is anxious because he cannot get the edict of succession, and urges the Emperor again who questions the identity of his biological father, leaving Zi Lu speechless.

programme.title: The Rebel Princess
programme.desc: An elated Zi Lu joins his wedding ceremony, but unbeknownst to him, his bride has been replaced by a maid on orders to assassinate him.

programme.title: Modern Dynasty
programme.desc: To facilitate collaboration with Lung Man-biu, Yan Sum suggests using part of the port development project funding.

programme.title: Modern Dynasty
programme.desc: Yan Sum uses a clip that shows Choi-mei trashing the high heel shoes as leverage to force Yiu-chung to agree to provide financial support for the new rail terminus project.

programme.title: Three-Body
programme.desc: After an assassination attempt is made on Shen Yu Fei, Ye Wen Jie encourages her to leave for safety. Ye Wen Jie brings Wang Miao to visit the long-abandoned Hong'an Base.

programme.title: Three-Body
programme.desc: Ye Wen Jie continures her story and reveals the true purpose of the base was to search for extraterrestrial civilizations. After bidding goodbye to Wang Miao, Ye Wen Jie stays and watches the sunset, as if waiting for something.

programme.title: My Guardian Angels
programme.desc: Dong Yu looks for Mandy's father, Ming Fa, and catches a reporter passing him money donated by the readers. Dong Yu follows Ming Fa to the gambling den and threatens Ming Fa with a video of him there. Ming Fa then clarifies online that his daughter is not unfilial and Mandy is grateful towards Dong Yu.

programme.title: Boiling Pot
programme.desc: Noelle visits the Chengdu Taste and Beijing Restaurant to experience the most authentic Sichuan flavor and Beijing snacks.
